amendment.description: Relating to the American Forces Network.

action.text: Amendment SA 2439 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2438.
Amendment SA 2439 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 2439 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2439 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 305.
